website_summaries.verdict: It's expensive, but the design is perfect for performing several different styles of sled workouts.
pros: Center post will accommodate Olympic-sized weight plates to gain more weight for your workouts
Allows for use of a harness to pull the sled or dual vertical posts to push the sled
Heavier sled than some others, at 111 pounds before you add any weight plates
cons: Rails may dig into the ground if you add too much weight to the sled

customer_reviews.title: Choose a different option. Price is great. Reflects quality.
customer_reviews.text: The sled is built very solid, so I’m giving it 2 stars. The plastic shoes on the skids of the sled make it very hard to push anywhere. My gym has thin carpet floors and I met more friction than necessary when moving the sled. I took it outside to attempt to push in the grass and the sled just dig into the ground. I have not tried it on turf yet. A little worried that the plastic shoes may mess up the turf. I am very displeased with this sled.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Best sled hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This sled is by far the best sled you will find on Amazon. Do yourself a favor and buy this sled over all others. It available options and design make it highly functional for use on any terrain. Built strong and can be used by anyone looking to up their exercise game. All my clients including myself love using this and is by far one of the favorite pieces of equipment in my arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Greer

customer_reviews.title: My unit came without the hardware needed to mount the ...
customer_reviews.text: My unit came without the hardware needed to mount the center weight platform pole. The drilled hole seems to be too small to use the hardware that came. It does feel solid and heavy though. If it had come correct, it would have gotten a 5. Also, the website where we are supposed to get help does not work. And the contact number on their website is currently disconnected, which is weird.
customer_reviews.author: allia

customer_reviews.title: breaks down easily, thing is a monster
customer_reviews.text: breaks down easily, thing is a monster, in grass you need to take off the sled shoes (a number of small bolts holds it together) simple and portable enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sled to work them legs
customer_reviews.text: Solid build quality and comes with 15/16in grade 8 bolts. The plate post is long enough for several rubber 45lb plates or 6-7 Olympic steel 45lb plates. Definitely worth the price. Hook locations for dragging the sled with a harness. The one star off is for minor paint defects on the posts that leave bare metal exposed. A little spray paint will have it fixed up no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: Thing is garbage. Will only work on smooth concrete. Any other surface it digs in like a plow. Poor design. To make it work better remove the sled shoes which is no easy task. Not worth the time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Country life

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Put to use! My son pushes this multiple times a week. My husband loves it. Great workout.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie V.

customer_reviews.title: Love this sled
customer_reviews.text: Love this sled, it is the exact same design as the rouge one, adapter parts are the same as well. This is well worth the money and workers flawless. This Sled is very versatile and take my garage gym to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Works great!! My son and I started using as ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! My son and I started using as soon as we received it. Well constructed and less expensive than the Rogue. Bought this for my son who is using for high school football training.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Sled
customer_reviews.text: I use these to train my fighters with and I love it. They hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Branden Enich

customer_reviews.title: It is a super heavy unit
customer_reviews.text: It is a super heavy unit, going to be perfect addition to arsenal of training. Some pieces got scratched up during transport, so there is bare metal (paint sheered off), but it does not affect the sled at all, just cosmetic. Looking forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia N.

customer_reviews.title: Solid and heavy
customer_reviews.text: So far it went together smoothly and runs great on carpet and concrete. Handled up to 310 lbs no problem.
customer_reviews.author: santosmr

customer_reviews.title: Great price for value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Products packagingwas rough but who cares there’s nothing to break. Hipefuly your sled doesn’t come with metal welding beads all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: High quality and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely will buy again! The steel is high quality . Packaging was great. Putting this together took no time at all. It has a rubber base to protect it from damaging the metal which is great. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SLED
customer_reviews.text: Almost paid more for Rogue's version. Glad i didn't. The pictures do not do the Titan sled justice. This thing is a unit, has a wider base than what appears, and is simple simple to assemble ( 2 bolts in each sled and 1 for the pole where the plates go).
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Titan sled
customer_reviews.text: Found something that look like gun powder in the box with the sled. Called Titan and they were not very helpful
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Botyos

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I would buy again but I have a feeling I won’t have to
customer_reviews.author: jennifer c.

customer_reviews.title: Great product thus far
customer_reviews.text: Great product thus far. Comparable to same model from rogue. Came with a slight malfunctional piece but customer service was prompt with sending a replacement part. Good company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Wow.....This is a very sturdy and durable product. The sled is a 110 pounds by itself. I think my son should be able to use this product for the next couple years and we plan to add a few accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jonesone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price, easy assembly and reasonable price. Also, quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Solid well built and super easy To put together
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Solid well built and super easy To put together.
customer_reviews.author: conan

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to push on the lawn
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, but I am unable to push it on the lawn because the front rails dig into the ground. I can drag it, but not push it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Titan does not disclose additional purchase is required
customer_reviews.text: We cannot use product, accessory purchased but cannot be assembled as after days of emails, and hours on hold, we were finally told that we would need to Purchase and accessory kit, to make the accessory we purchased with the sled feasible to use. This was not disclosed, and took several days for them to respond with numerous people advising they would take care of problem. At the end of all this, they finally sent an email advising we need to purchase another item to make our accessory work. We have a product that we cannot use.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job, but came with some minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. It’s heavy, strong, and will do the job needed. However, when it arrived the box was torn. The paint on the sled was chipped, and the two posts to push the sled forward are pretty wobbly since they are interchangeable and aren’t screwed down. Overall, I like the product just some minor tweaks or things to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

product_meta.title: TITAN Fitness Pro Sled System
feature_bullets: Multi-use push / drag handle at 30" off the ground.
Handle height targets the upper body.
Install the sleeve to your sled and use the quick pin to easily install or remove handle.
